Plot: An Iowa corn farmer, hearing voices, interprets them as a command to build a baseball diamond in his fields; he does, and the Chicago White Sox come.
Title: Field of Dreams
Actors: Kevin Costner, Amy Madigan, Gaby Hoffmann, Ray Liotta
tomatoConsensus: Field of Dreams is sentimental, but in the best way; it's a mix of fairy tale, baseball, and family togetherness.
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 6 wins & 10 nominations.
